sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* MACA0050.SEARCH00 세금계산서조회 */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.TAXY_MONT /* 세금계산서년월 */ , A.TAXX_NUMB /* 세금계산서번호 */ , DECODE(C.BIZR_NUMB,null,C.RERN_NUMB,C.BIZR_NUMB) AS CUTX_CUNM /* 공급자받는자 사업자 번호 */ , A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ , DECODE(D.BIZR_NUMB,null,D.RERN_NUMB,D.BIZR_NUMB) AS METX_CUNM /* 공급자 사업자 번호 */ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , A.MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , A.TAXX_AMTX /* 청구금액 */ , A.TAXX_VATX /* 부가세액 */ , A.SUMM_AMTX /* 합계금액 */ , A.DEND_DATE /* 청구일자 */ , A.PRNT_DATE /* 발행일자 */ , A.SACH_NUMB /* 매출전표번호 */ , A.BIZR_NUMB /* 광고주사업자번호 */ , A.MEMO_FILD /* 비고 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , A.OWNR_NAME /* 광고주대표자명 */ , A.ADDR_DESC /* 주소 */ , A.DTL1_ADDR /* 주소1 */ , A.DTL2_ADDR /* 주소2 */ , H.OWNR_NAME AS MOWN_NAME /* 매체사대표명 */ , H.ADDR_DESC AS MADD_DESC /* 매체사주소 */ , A.MDT1_ADDR /* 매체사주소1 */ , A.MDT2_ADDR /* 매체사주소2 */ , SUBSTR(A.DTIX_TYPE,1,2) DTIX_TYPE /* 세금계산서종류 */ , SUBSTR(A.DTIX_TYPE,3,2) DTIY_TYPE /* 세금계산서분류 */ , A.BUSI_FLAG /* 위수탁 수수료 구분 */ , A.TAXX_DMND /* 영수구분 */ , SF_GET_CUSTEMAILTAX(A.CUST_CODE) AS ELTR_MLAD /*광고주 담당자 EMAIL주소*/ , SF_GET_MDIAGUBN_CUSTEMAILTAX(A.MEDX_FLAG,A.MEDX_CODE) AS MELT_MLAD /*매체사 담당자 EMAIL주소 SF_GET_CUSTEMAILTAX(A.MEDX_CODE)*/ , F.OFFI_NAME AS CCUS_NAME /*수탁자 상호*/ , F.BSNS_NUMB AS CBIZ_NUMB /*수탁자 사업자번호*/ , F.OWNR_NAME AS COWN_NAME /*수탁자 대표자성명 */ , F.ADDR_DESC AS CADD_DESC /*수탁자 주소*/ , A.TAXY_NUMB , I.TRAN_STATUS /*전송상태*/ , I.DTI_STATUS /*최종상태*/ , I.RETURN_CODE , I.RETURN_DESCRIPTION , A.CONVERSATION_ID , A.ORI_ISSUE_ID , A.AMEND_CODE , C.BSNS_STAT /*광고주업태*/ , C.BSNS_TYPE /*광고주업종*/ , D.BSNS_STAT MBSN_STAT /*매체사업태*/ , D.BSNS_TYPE MBSN_TYPE /*매체사업종*/ , F.BSNS_STAT CBSN_STAT /*농심기획업태*/ , F.BSNS_TYPE CBSN_TYPE /*농심기획업종*/ , J.ELTR_MLAD CELT_MLAD /*발송자 이메일 주소*/ , A.MEMO_FILD FROM MD_SATXXH A /* [매체세금계산서 헤더테이블] */ LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE F ON F.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND F.OFFI_GUBN ='1' LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM H ON A.MEDX_CODE = H.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN XXSB_DTI_STATUS I ON A.CONVERSATION_ID = I.CONVERSATION_ID LEFT JOIN HR_MASTXD J ON J.EMPL_NUMB = #EMPL_CODE# WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.BUSI_FLAG= #BUSI_FLAG# AND A.SEND_FLAG IS NULL
A.CUST_CODE LIKE '%' || #CUST_CODE# || '%' /* 광고주코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%' || #CUST_NAME# || '%' /* 광고주명 */
(A.MEDX_FLAG=#MEDX_FLAG# OR A.MEDX_FLAG <= 'A003') /* 매체구분 */
A.MEDX_FLAG= #MEDX_FLAG# /* 매체구분 */
A.CUST_CODE LIKE '%' || #CUST_CODE# || '%' /* 광고주코드 */
ORDER BY A.TAXY_NUMB

SELECT /*MACA0050.SEARCH01 발송 세금계산서조회 */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , DECODE(I.TRAN_STATUS,'E',1,'T',2,'C',3,4) ROW_NUM , A.TAXY_MONT /* 세금계산서년월 */ , A.TAXX_NUMB /* 세금계산서번호 */ , DECODE(C.BIZR_NUMB,null,C.RERN_NUMB,C.BIZR_NUMB) AS CUTX_CUNM /* 공급자받는자 사업자 번호 */ , A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ , DECODE(D.BIZR_NUMB,null,D.RERN_NUMB,D.BIZR_NUMB) AS METX_CUNM /* 공급자 사업자 번호 */ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , A.MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , J.SUP_AMOUNT AS TAXX_AMTX /* 청구금액 */ , J.TAX_AMOUNT AS TAXX_VATX /* 부가세액 */ , J.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS SUMM_AMTX /* 합계금액 */ , A.DEND_DATE /* 청구일자 */ , A.PRNT_DATE /* 발행일자 */ , A.SACH_NUMB /* 매출전표번호 */ , A.BIZR_NUMB /* 광고주사업자번호 */ , A.MEMO_FILD /* 비고 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , A.OWNR_NAME /* 광고주대표자명 */ , A.ADDR_DESC /* 주소 */ , A.DTL1_ADDR /* 주소1 */ , A.DTL2_ADDR /* 주소2 */ , A.MOWN_NAME /* 매체사대표명 */ , A.MADD_DESC /* 매체사주소 */ , A.MDT1_ADDR /* 매체사주소1 */ , A.MDT2_ADDR /* 매체사주소2 */ , SUBSTR(A.DTIX_TYPE,1,2) DTIX_TYPE /* 세금계산서종류 */ , SUBSTR(A.DTIX_TYPE,3,2) DTIY_TYPE /* 세금계산서분류 */ , A.BUSI_FLAG /* 위수탁 수수료 구분 */ , A.TAXX_DMND /* 영수구분 */ , SF_GET_CUSTEMAILTAX(A.CUST_CODE) AS ELTR_MLAD /*광고주 담당자 EMAIL주소*/ , SF_GET_MDIAGUBN_CUSTEMAILTAX(A.MEDX_FLAG, A.MEDX_CODE) AS MELT_MLAD /*매체사 담당자 EMAIL주소 SF_GET_CUSTEMAILTAX(A.MEDX_CODE)*/ , F.OFFI_NAME AS CCUS_NAME /*수탁자 상호*/ , F.BSNS_NUMB AS CBIZ_NUMB /*수탁자 사업자번호*/ , F.OWNR_NAME AS COWN_NAME /*수탁자 대표자성명 */ , F.ADDR_DESC AS CADD_DESC /*수탁자 주소*/ , A.TAXY_NUMB , I.TRAN_STATUS /**/ , I.DTI_STATUS /*최종상태*/ , I.RETURN_CODE , I.RETURN_DESCRIPTION , A.CONVERSATION_ID , A.ORI_ISSUE_ID , A.MEMO_FILD FROM MD_SATXXH A /* [매체세금계산서 헤더테이블] */ LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE F ON F.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND F.OFFI_GUBN ='1' LEFT JOIN XXSB_DTI_STATUS I ON A.CONVERSATION_ID = I.CONVERSATION_ID LEFT JOIN XXSB_DTI_MAIN J ON A.CONVERSATION_ID = J.CONVERSATION_ID WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.BUSI_FLAG= #BUSI_FLAG# AND A.SEND_FLAG = '1'
A.CUST_CODE LIKE '%' || #CUST_CODE# || '%' /* 광고주코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%' || #CUST_NAME# || '%' /* 광고주명 */
(A.MEDX_FLAG=#MEDX_FLAG# OR A.MEDX_FLAG <= 'A003') /* 매체구분 */
A.MEDX_FLAG= #MEDX_FLAG# /* 매체구분 */
A.CUST_CODE LIKE '%' || #CUST_CODE# || '%' /* 광고주코드 */
ORDER BY ROW_NUM,A.TAXY_NUMB

SELECT /* MDMA0030.SEARCH01 광고주목록 가져오기 */ A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , A.CUST_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , ' ' AS USEX_CODE /* NULL */ FROM TA_CUSTXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXD B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND B.CUCL_CODE = 'FA260110'
SELECT CUST_CODE AS CUST_CODE ,ELTR_MLAD AS COMB_CODE ,ELTR_MLAD AS COMB_NAME ,EMPL_GUBN FROM TA_CUSTMN WHERE 1=1 AND CUST_CODE IN ($CUST_CODE$) ORDER BY DECODE(MJCH_YSNO,'1',0,SEQN_NUMB)
SELECT CUST_CODE AS MEDX_CODE ,ELTR_MLAD AS COMB_CODE ,ELTR_MLAD AS COMB_NAME ,EMPL_GUBN FROM TA_CUSTMN WHERE 1=1 AND CUST_CODE IN ($MEDX_CODE$) ORDER BY DECODE(MJCH_YSNO,'1',0,SEQN_NUMB)
SELECT /* MACA0050.GET_DTI_LINE_NUMB 세금계산서에 묶여있는 거래명세서의 개수 */ COUNT(TAXY_MONT) FROM MD_TRANXD WHERE TAXY_MONT=#TAXY_MONT# AND TAXX_NUMB = #TAXX_NUMB#

SELECT /* MACA0050.GET_DTI_LINE_NUMA 세금계산서에 묶여있는 개별청약서의 개수 */ COUNT(CMTX_NUMB)
FROM MD_ETMDXM
FROM MD_ETMDXM
FROM MD_CTMDXM
FROM MD_PTMDXM
FROM MD_PTMDXM
FROM MD_ODMDXM
FROM MD_ITMDXM
WHERE YEAR_MNTH = #TAXY_MONT# AND CMTX_NUMB=#TAXY_NUMB#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO XXSB_DTI_MAIN ( /* MACA0050.SAVE00 세금계산서 발송 */ CONVERSATION_ID /* */ ,SUPBUY_TYPE /* */ ,DIRECTION /* */ ,INTERFACE_BATCH_ID /* */ ,DTI_WDATE /* */ ,DTI_IDATE /* */ ,DTI_SDATE /* */ ,TYPE_CODE /* */ ,DTI_TYPE /* */ ,TAX_DEMAND /* */ ,SEQ_ID /* */ ,SUP_COM_ID /* */ ,SUP_COM_REGNO /* */ ,SUP_REP_NAME /* */ ,SUP_COM_NAME /* */ ,SUP_COM_TYPE /* */ ,SUP_COM_CLASSIFY /* */ ,SUP_COM_ADDR /* */ ,SUP_DEPT_NAME /* */ ,SUP_EMP_NAME /* */ ,SUP_TEL_NUM /* */ ,SUP_EMAIL /* */ ,SUP_BIZPLACE_CODE /* */ ,BYR_COM_ID /* */ ,BYR_COM_REGNO /* */ ,BYR_REP_NAME /* */ ,BYR_COM_NAME /* */ ,BYR_COM_TYPE /* */ ,BYR_COM_CLASSIFY /* */ ,BYR_COM_ADDR /* */ ,BYR_DEPT_NAME /* */ ,BYR_EMP_NAME /* */ ,BYR_TEL_NUM /* */ ,BYR_EMAIL /* */ ,BYR_DEPT_NAME2 /* */ ,BYR_EMP_NAME2 /* */ ,BYR_TEL_NUM2 /* */ ,BYR_EMAIL2 /* */ ,BYR_BIZPLACE_CODE /* */ ,BROKER_COM_ID /* */ ,BROKER_COM_REGNO /* */ ,BROKER_REP_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_COM_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_COM_TYPE /* */ ,BROKER_COM_CLASSIFY /* */ ,BROKER_COM_ADDR /* */ ,BROKER_DEPT_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_EMP_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_TEL_NUM /* */ ,BROKER_EMAIL /* */ ,BRK_BIZPLACE_CODE /* */ ,CASH_CODE /* */ ,CASH_AMOUNT /* */ ,CHECK_CODE /* */ ,CHECK_AMOUNT /* */ ,NOTE_CODE /* */ ,NOTE_AMOUNT /* */ ,RECEIVABLE_CODE /* */ ,RECEIVABLE_AMOUNT /* */ ,SUP_AMOUNT /* */ ,TAX_AMOUNT /* */ ,TOT_FOREIGN_AMOUNT /* */ ,TOTAL_AMOUNT /* */ ,TOTAL_QUANTITY /* */ ,DTT_YN /* */ ,REMARK /* */ ,REMARK2 /* */ ,REMARK3 /* */ ,ETCNUM1 /* */ ,ETCNUM2 /* */ ,ETCNUM3 /* */ ,ETCNUM4 /* */ ,DTI_MSG /* */ ,AMEND_CODE /* */ ,EXCHANGED_DOC_ID /* */ ,APPROVE_ID /* */ ,ATTACHFILE_YN /* */ ,ASP_SMTP_MAIL /* */ ,ORI_ISSUE_ID /* */ ,CREATED_BY /* */ ,CREATION_DATE /* */ ,LAST_UPDATED_BY /* */ ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE /* */ ) VALUES ( #CONVERSATION_ID# /* */ ,'AR' /* */ ,'2' /* */ ,#INTERFACE_BATCH_ID# /* */ ,#PRNT_DATE# /* */ ,#DTI_IDATE# /* */ ,#DTI_SDATE# /* */ ,#TYPE_CODE# /* */ ,#DTIX_TYPE#||#DTIY_TYPE# /* */ ,#TAXX_DMND# /* 영수구분 */ ,#SEQ_ID# /* */ ,#SUP_COM_ID# /* */ ,#METX_CUNM# /* 공급자 사업자등록번호 */ ,#MOWN_NAME# /* 공급자 대표자성명 */ ,#MEDX_CDNM# /* 공급자 상호 */ ,#MBSN_STAT# /* */ ,#MBSN_TYPE# /* */ ,#MADD_DESC# /* 공급자 주소 */ ,#SUP_DEPT_NAME# /* */ ,#SUP_EMP_NAME# /* */ ,#SUP_TEL_NUM# /* */ ,#MELT_MLAD# /* */ ,#SUP_BIZPLACE_CODE# /* */ ,#BYR_COM_ID# /* */ ,#CUTX_CUNM# /* 받는자 사업자등록번호 */ ,#OWNR_NAME# /* 공급받는자 대표자성명 */ ,#CUST_NAME# /* 공급받는자 상호 */ ,#BSNS_STAT# /* */ ,#BSNS_TYPE# /* */ ,#ADDR_DESC# /* 공급받는자 주소 */ ,#BYR_DEPT_NAME# /* */ ,#BYR_EMP_NAME# /* */ ,#BYR_TEL_NUM# /* */ ,#ELTR_MLAD# /* 받는자 담당자 이메일 */ ,#BYR_DEPT_NAME2# /* */ ,#BYR_EMP_NAME2# /* */ ,#BYR_TEL_NUM2# /* */ ,#BYR_EMAIL2# /* */ ,#BYR_BIZPLACE_CODE# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_ID# /* */ ,#CBIZ_NUMB# /* 수탁자 사업자등록번호 */ ,#COWN_NAME# /* 수탁자 대표자성명 */ ,#CCUS_NAME# /* 수탁자 상호 */ ,#CBSN_STAT# /* */ ,#CBSN_TYPE# /* */ ,#CADD_DESC# /* 수탁자 주소 */ ,#DEPT_NAME# /* 수탁자 담당부서명 */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 수탁자 담당자명 */ ,#BROKER_TEL_NUM# /* */ ,#CELT_MLAD# /* */ ,#BRK_BIZPLACE_CODE# /* */ ,#CASH_CODE# /* */ ,#CASH_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#CHECK_CODE# /* */ ,#CHECK_AMOUNT# /* */ ,'' ,#NOTE_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#RECEIVABLE_CODE# /* */ ,#RECEIVABLE_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#TAXX_AMTX# /* */ ,#TAXX_VATX# /* */ ,#TOT_FOREIGN_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#SUMM_AMTX# /* */ ,#TOTAL_QUANTITY# /* */ ,'N' /* */ ,#REMARK# /* */ ,#REMARK2# /* */ ,#REMARK3# /* */ ,#ETCNUM1# /* */ ,#ETCNUM2# /* */ ,#ETCNUM3# /* */ ,#ETCNUM4# /* */ ,#DTI_MSG# /* */ ,#AMEND_CODE# /* */ ,#EXCHANGED_DOC_ID# /* */ ,#APPROVE_ID# /* */ ,#ATTACHFILE_YN# /* */ ,#ASP_SMTP_MAIL# /* */ ,#ORI_ISSUE_ID# /* */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 작성자 */ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') /* 작성일시 */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 최종수정자 */ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') /* 최종수정일시 */ )

INSERT INTO XXSB_DTI_MAIN ( /* MACA0050.SAVE00 세금계산서 발송 */ CONVERSATION_ID /* */ ,SUPBUY_TYPE /* */ ,DIRECTION /* */ ,INTERFACE_BATCH_ID /* */ ,DTI_WDATE /* */ ,DTI_IDATE /* */ ,DTI_SDATE /* */ ,TYPE_CODE /* */ ,DTI_TYPE /* */ ,TAX_DEMAND /* */ ,SEQ_ID /* */ ,SUP_COM_ID /* */ ,SUP_COM_REGNO /* */ ,SUP_REP_NAME /* */ ,SUP_COM_NAME /* */ ,SUP_COM_TYPE /* */ ,SUP_COM_CLASSIFY /* */ ,SUP_COM_ADDR /* */ ,SUP_DEPT_NAME /* */ ,SUP_EMP_NAME /* */ ,SUP_TEL_NUM /* */ ,SUP_EMAIL /* */ ,SUP_BIZPLACE_CODE /* */ ,BYR_COM_ID /* */ ,BYR_COM_REGNO /* */ ,BYR_REP_NAME /* */ ,BYR_COM_NAME /* */ ,BYR_COM_TYPE /* */ ,BYR_COM_CLASSIFY /* */ ,BYR_COM_ADDR /* */ ,BYR_DEPT_NAME /* */ ,BYR_EMP_NAME /* */ ,BYR_TEL_NUM /* */ ,BYR_EMAIL /* */ ,BYR_DEPT_NAME2 /* */ ,BYR_EMP_NAME2 /* */ ,BYR_TEL_NUM2 /* */ ,BYR_EMAIL2 /* */ ,BYR_BIZPLACE_CODE /* */ ,BROKER_COM_ID /* */ ,BROKER_COM_REGNO /* */ ,BROKER_REP_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_COM_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_COM_TYPE /* */ ,BROKER_COM_CLASSIFY /* */ ,BROKER_COM_ADDR /* */ ,BROKER_DEPT_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_EMP_NAME /* */ ,BROKER_TEL_NUM /* */ ,BROKER_EMAIL /* */ ,BRK_BIZPLACE_CODE /* */ ,CASH_CODE /* */ ,CASH_AMOUNT /* */ ,CHECK_CODE /* */ ,CHECK_AMOUNT /* */ ,NOTE_CODE /* */ ,NOTE_AMOUNT /* */ ,RECEIVABLE_CODE /* */ ,RECEIVABLE_AMOUNT /* */ ,SUP_AMOUNT /* */ ,TAX_AMOUNT /* */ ,TOT_FOREIGN_AMOUNT /* */ ,TOTAL_AMOUNT /* */ ,TOTAL_QUANTITY /* */ ,DTT_YN /* */ ,REMARK /* */ ,REMARK2 /* */ ,REMARK3 /* */ ,ETCNUM1 /* */ ,ETCNUM2 /* */ ,ETCNUM3 /* */ ,ETCNUM4 /* */ ,DTI_MSG /* */ ,AMEND_CODE /* */ ,EXCHANGED_DOC_ID /* */ ,APPROVE_ID /* */ ,ATTACHFILE_YN /* */ ,ASP_SMTP_MAIL /* */ ,ORI_ISSUE_ID /* */ ,CREATED_BY /* */ ,CREATION_DATE /* */ ,LAST_UPDATED_BY /* */ ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE /* */ ) VALUES ( #CONVERSATION_ID# /* */ ,'AR' /* */ ,'2' /* */ ,#INTERFACE_BATCH_ID# /* */ ,#PRNT_DATE# /* 세금계산서 일자 */ ,#DTI_IDATE# /* */ ,#DTI_SDATE# /* */ ,#TYPE_CODE# /* */ ,#DTIX_TYPE#||#DTIY_TYPE# /* 세금계산서 종류 */ ,#TAXX_DMND# /* 영수구분 */ ,#SEQ_ID# /* */ ,#SUP_COM_ID# /* */ ,#CBIZ_NUMB# /* 공급자 사업자등록번호 */ ,#COWN_NAME# /* 공급자 대표자성명 */ ,#CCUS_NAME# /* 공급자 상호 */ ,#CBSN_STAT# /* */ ,#CBSN_TYPE# /* */ ,#CADD_DESC# /* 공급자 주소 */ ,#DEPT_NAME# /* 공급자 담당부서명 */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 공급자 담당자명 */ ,#SUP_TEL_NUM# /* */ ,#CELT_MLAD# /* */ ,#SUP_BIZPLACE_CODE# /* */ ,#BYR_COM_ID# /* */ ,#METX_CUNM# /* 받는자 사업자등록번호 */ ,#MOWN_NAME# /* 공급받는자 대표자성명 */ ,#MEDX_CDNM# /* 공급받는자 상호 */ ,#MBSN_STAT# /* */ ,#MBSN_TYPE# /* */ ,#MADD_DESC# /* 공급받는자 주소 */ ,#BYR_DEPT_NAME# /* */ ,#BYR_EMP_NAME# /* */ ,#BYR_TEL_NUM# /* */ ,#MELT_MLAD# /* 받는자 담당자 이메일 */ ,#BYR_DEPT_NAME2# /* */ ,#BYR_EMP_NAME2# /* */ ,#BYR_TEL_NUM2# /* */ ,#BYR_EMAIL2# /* */ ,#BYR_BIZPLACE_CODE# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_ID# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_REGNO# /* */ ,#BROKER_REP_NAME# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_NAME# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_TYPE# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_CLASSIFY# /* */ ,#BROKER_COM_ADDR# /* */ ,#BROKER_DEPT_NAME# /* */ ,#BROKER_EMP_NAME# /* */ ,#BROKER_TEL_NUM# /* */ ,#BROKER_EMAIL# /* */ ,#BRK_BIZPLACE_CODE# /* */ ,#CASH_CODE# /* */ ,#CASH_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#CHECK_CODE# /* */ ,#CHECK_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#NOTE_CODE# /* */ ,#NOTE_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#RECEIVABLE_CODE# /* */ ,#RECEIVABLE_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#TAXX_AMTX# /* */ ,#TAXX_VATX# /* */ ,#TOT_FOREIGN_AMOUNT# /* */ ,#SUMM_AMTX# /* */ ,#TOTAL_QUANTITY# /* */ ,'N' /* */ ,#REMARK# /* */ ,#REMARK2# /* */ ,#REMARK3# /* */ ,#ETCNUM1# /* */ ,#ETCNUM2# /* */ ,#ETCNUM3# /* */ ,#ETCNUM4# /* */ ,#DTI_MSG# /* */ ,#AMEND_CODE# /* */ ,#EXCHANGED_DOC_ID# /* */ ,#APPROVE_ID# /* */ ,#ATTACHFILE_YN# /* */ ,#ASP_SMTP_MAIL# /* */ ,#ORI_ISSUE_ID# /* */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 작성자 */ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') /* 작성일시 */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 최종수정자 */ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') /* 최종수정일시 */ )

INSERT INTO XXSB_DTI_ITEM ( /* MACA0050.SAVE11 세금계산서 발송 */ CONVERSATION_ID /* CONVERSATION_ID */ ,SUPBUY_TYPE /* 매입/매출 구분 */ ,DIRECTION /* 정/역 구분 */ ,DTI_LINE_NUM /* dti_line_num */ ,ITEM_CODE /* 품목코드 */ ,ITEM_NAME /* 품목명 */ ,ITEM_SIZE /* 규격 */ ,ITEM_MD /* 구입일자 */ ,SUP_AMOUNT /* */ ,TAX_AMOUNT /* */ ,ITEM_GUBUN /* ITEM 구분값 */ ,CREATED_BY /* 작성자 */ ,CREATION_DATE /* 작성일시 */ ,LAST_UPDATED_BY /* 최종수정자 */ ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE /* 최종수정일시 */ ) SELECT #CONVERSATION_ID# ,'AR' ,'2' ,TAXX_IDXX ,#ITEM_CODE# ,DECODE(MEM2_FILD,NULL,MEMO_FILD,MEM2_FILD) AS MEMO_FILD ,#ITEM_SIZE# ,DEND_DATE ,NVL(TAXX_AMTX,0) ,NVL(TAXX_VATX,0) ,'DTI' ,#UPDT_USID# ,SYSDATE ,#UPDT_USID# ,SYSDATE FROM MD_SATXXD WHERE 1=1 AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT# AND TAXX_NUMB = #TAXX_NUMB#

INSERT INTO XXSB_DTI_STATUS ( /* MACA0050.SAVE11 세금계산서 발송 */ CONVERSATION_ID /* CONVERSATION_ID */ ,SUPBUY_TYPE /* 매입/매출 구분 */ ,DIRECTION /* 정/역 구분 */ ,DTI_STATUS /* 최종상태 */ ,TRAN_STATUS /* 전송상태 */ ,RETURN_CODE /* RETURN_CODE */ ,RETURN_DESCRIPTION /* RETURN_DESCRIPTION */ ,SBDESCRIPTION /* 거부/취소사유 */ ,DEPT_NAME /* 부서명 */ ,CREATED_BY /* 작성자 */ ,CREATION_DATE /* 작성 일시 */ ,LAST_UPDATED_BY /* 최종수정 자 */ ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE /* 최종수정 일시 */ ,ATT01 /* */ ,ATT02 /* */ ,ATT03 /* */ ,ATT04 /* */ ,ATT05 /* */ ,ATT06 /* */ ,ATT07 /* */ ,ATT08 /* */ ,ATT09 /* */ ,ATT10 /* */ ,ATT11 /* */ ) VALUES ( #CONVERSATION_ID# /* CONVERSATION_ID */ ,'AR' /* 매입/매출 구분 */ ,'2' /* 정/역 구분 */ ,'I' /* 최종상태 */ ,'I' /* 전송상태 */ ,#RETURN_CODE# /* RETURN_CODE */ ,#RETURN_DESCRIPTION# /* RETURN_DESCRIPTION */ ,#SBDESCRIPTION# /* 거부/취소사유 */ ,#DEPT_NAME# /* 부서명 */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 작성자 */ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') /* 작성일시 */ ,#EMPL_NAME# /* 최종수정자 */ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') /* 최종수정일시 */ ,#ATT01# /* */ ,#ATT02# /* */ ,#ATT03# /* */ ,#ATT04# /* */ ,#ATT05# /* */ ,#ATT06# /* */ ,#ATT07# /* */ ,#ATT08# /* */ ,#ATT09# /* */ ,#ATT10# /* */ ,#ATT11# /* */ )

INSERT INTO XXSB_DTI_INTERFACE ( /*MACA0050.SAVE12 세금계산서 저장 */ MESSAGE_ID /* 인터페이스식별자 */ ,CONVERSATION_ID /* CONVERSATION_ID */ ,SUPBUY_TYPE /* 매입/매출 구분 */ ,DIRECTION /* 정/역 구분 */ ,SIGNAL /* 요청시그널 */ ,MESSAGE_STATUS_FLAG /* 인터페이스 상태 플래그 */ ,TARGET_SYSTEM_ID /* 매입자 시스템 식별자 */ ,AUTH_TICKET /* 인증토큰 */ ,META_STRING /* 메타 문서 */ ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE /* 수정시간 */ ) VALUES ( #CONVERSATION_ID#||ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(10000, 99999),0) /* 인터페이스식별자 */ ,#CONVERSATION_ID# /* CONVERSATION_ID */ ,'AR' /* 매입/매출 구분 */ ,'2' /* 정/역 구분 */ ,'ARISSUE' /* 요청시그널 */ ,'N' /* 인터페이스 상태 플래그 */ ,#TARGET_SYSTEM_ID# /* 매입자 시스템 식별자 */ ,#AUTH_TICKET# /* 인증토큰 */ ,'<SMTP_EMAIL>'||#ELTR_MLAD#||'</SMTP_EMAIL>' /* 메타 문서 */ ,SYSDATE /* 수정시간 */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MD_SATXXH /* MACA0050.UPDATE00 거래명세서에 세금계산서 플래그삭제 */ SET SEND_FLAG = '1' /* 세금계산서 생성유무 */ ,CONVERSATION_ID = #CONVERSATION_ID# WHERE PRNT_DATE=#PRNT_DATE# AND TAXX_NUMB=#TAXX_NUMB#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* MACA0050.NEW_SEQ_ID 신규 세금계산서 일련번호 채번 */ CASE WHEN MAX(SEQ_ID)>9999 THEN LPAD(SUBSTR(MAX(CAST(SEQ_ID AS NUMERIC)),-4),4,'0') ELSE LPAD(NVL(MAX(CAST(SEQ_ID AS NUMERIC)),0)+1,4,'0') END FROM XXSB_DTI_MAIN
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MD_SATXXH /* MACA0060.updateTAXX_FLAG00 거래명세서에 세금계산서 플래그삭제 */ SET CONVERSATION_ID = '' /* 세금계산서 생성유무 */ ,SEND_FLAG = '' /*전송플래그*/ WHERE CONVERSATION_ID=#CONVERSATION_ID#
